title: Person of Interest | John Reese Legendary
author: Real Scorsese
comment:
Thank you really for the 4 000 VIEWS ! WOW you're are the best !!! :D

Edit: 50K?? 😱
Love the ending. "Good to see you again John". Yes john, you are alive forever in our hearts!
This is one of my favourite person of interest videos. Such an awesome tribute to a remarkable character

Hansome and dangerous Reese. This show ended abruptly. Fans must reactivate it writing to Warner Brothers on FB and Twitter. Reese would never let you down, so we must keep him alive for a new round of episode or a film. A very good video, to rewatch often again and again.
Proof positive that John Reese was THE best BAMF.  He did NOT die on that damn rooftop!  #ReeseLivesForeverInMyHeart
description:
If the video shows unavailable on your smartphone, try it from a computer.

Montage video created by me.

Title : Legendary John Reese

Take a look around me
Taking pages from a magazine
Been looking for the answer
Ever since we were seventeen
You know the truth can be a weapon
To fight this world of ill intentions
A new answer to the same question
How many times will you learn the same lesson?
I think they got it all wrong
We just got to hold on
And on, and on, and on
Cause we're gonna be legends
Gonna get their attention
What we're doing here aint just scary
It's about to be legendary
Yeah we're gonna be legends
Gonna teach 'em all a lesson
Got this feeling that we're so sweet caring
It's about to be legendary
This is what we came for
And we couldn't want it anymore
We could never turn back now
Got to leave it all on the floor
Been dreaming of the payoff
Through the struggles and the trade-offs
Write in truth heading on the way up
Tell them the truth but they think it's just made up
I think they got it all wrong
We just got to hold on
And on, and on, and on
Cause we're gonna be legends
Gonna get their attention
What we're doing here aint just scary
It's about to be legendary
Yeah we're gonna be legends
Gonna teach 'em all a lesson
Got this feeling that we're so sweet caring
It's about to be legendary
Eventually their gonna know who's right
To make a stand you got to win the fight
Can't stand the heat then just stay out the light
For I might not make it out alive
You gotta live without the columbines
They never want to hear your battlecry
Yeah we're gonna be legends
Gonna get their attention
What we're doing here aint just scary
It's about to be legendary
Yeah we're gonna be legends
Gonna teach 'em all a lesson
Got this feeling that we're so sweet caring
It's about to be legendary
